channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【Stateless Architecture: The Key to Building Scalable and Resilient Systems】无状态架构：构建可扩展和弹性系统的关键
item.description: 【In today's rapidly evolving digital landscape, developers face the constant challenge of building applications that are not only robust and secure but also infinitely scalable.】在当今快速发展的数字环境中，开发人员面临着构建不仅强大、安全而且可无限扩展的应用程序的持续挑战。

item.title: 【Uber’s Billion Trips Migration Setup with Zero Downtime】Uber 十亿次行程迁移设置零停机
item.description: 【Maintaining uptime during system upgrades or migrations is essential, especially for high-stakes, real-time platforms like Uber's trip fulfillment system.】在系统升级或迁移期间保持正常运行至关重要，尤其是对于 Uber 的行程履行系统等高风险实时平台。

item.title: 【My NEW book, Coding Interview Patterns, is now available on Amazon】我的新书《编码面试模式》现已在亚马逊上发售
item.description: 【My new book, Coding Interview Patterns, is now available on Amazon!】我的新书《编码面试模式》现已在亚马逊上发售！

item.title: 【How LinkedIn Customizes Its 7 Trillion Message Kafka Ecosystem】LinkedIn 如何定制其 7 万亿消息 Kafka 生态系统
item.description: 【Disclaimer: The details in this post have been derived from the LinkedIn Engineering Blog.】免责声明：本文中的详细信息来自 LinkedIn 工程博客。

item.title: 【EP141: How to Ace System Design Interviews Like a Boss?】EP141：如何像老板一样在系统设计面试中取得好成绩？
item.description: 【They are the most critical components to crafting successful software systems.】它们是构建成功的软件系统的最关键组件。

item.title: 【Distributed Caching: The Secret to High-Performance Applications】分布式缓存：高性能应用程序的秘密
item.description: 【The demand for high-speed, high-performance applications has skyrocketed in recent years.】近年来，对高速、高性能应用的需求猛增。

item.title: 【Mastering Modern Authentication: Cookies, Sessions, JWT, and PASETO】掌握现代身份验证：Cookie、Session、JWT 和 PASETO
item.description: 【Authentication serves as the first line of defense in ensuring the security of applications and the sensitive data they handle.】身份验证是确保应用程序及其处理的敏感数据安全的第一道防线。

item.title: 【EP139: Design a Live Streaming System】EP139：设计直播系统
item.description: 【Mike Tyson vs. Jake Paul was live-streamed on Netflix last week. Let’s break down the typical tech stack of a live-streaming system.】迈克·泰森 (Mike Tyson) 对阵杰克·保罗 (Jake Paul) 上周在 Netflix 上进行了直播。让我们来分解一下直播系统的典型技术堆栈。

item.title: 【A Crash Course on Using AI to Save Time and Focus on What Matters】使用人工智能节省时间并专注于重要事情的速成课程
item.description: 【7 steps to level up your AI prompts and 8 of my favorite AI use cases for work.】升级 AI 提示的 7 个步骤以及我最喜欢的 8 个 AI 工作用例。
